ar: لا اتكلم عربي جيدا Lā atakallam `arabi [jayyidan]
Do you speak English? هل تتكلم الانجليزية hal tatakallam el-ingliziyya?

en: Is there someone here who speaks English?
ar: حد بيتكلم انجليزي؟ had beyetkallem ingelīzi? (Egyptian); حدن بيحكي انجليزي hadan byihki ingilīzi (Levantine)
shurta, bulīs! (شرطة‎, بوليس)‎; راح اتصل بالشرطة (rāh attasil bil-shurta) (Levantine); هتصل بالبوليس (hattasil bel-bulīs) (Egyptian)
محتاج مساعدة لو سمحت (mihtāj musā`da law samaht)
I lost my bag. (لقد فقدت حقيبتى)
I lost my wallet. (لقد فقدت محفظتى)
I'm sick. (انا مريض (M) OR انا مريضة (F))
I've been injured. إنني مصاب(Innani Musabun)
Can I use your phone? (هل ممكن أستخدم التلفون؟)
الف  alf  (as in The Thousand and One Nights - الف ليلة وليلة  Alf Layla wa Layla)
إلى الامام il al-amām; على طول `ala tūl (Egyptian); dughri (Jordan/Egyptian)
ببطء bi-but'; شوي شوي shway shway (Levantine)
إنتظر دقيقه واحده intadhir daqīqa wāhida.
أنتما antumā (rarely used out of the most formal Literary Arabic)

en: they (two people) : هما huma (rarely used out of the most formal Literary Arabic)

ar: هن hunna (rarely used out of the most formal Literary Arabic)
من أين أنت min ayn anta
هل تتكلم الإنجليزية؟ hal tatakallam el-ingliziyya?
أنا لا أفهم ana lā afham / أنا مش فاهم ana mesh fāhem (Egyptian)
a`mal fi _____  _____أعمل في / ana bashtaghel fi _____أنا باشتغل في (Egyptian)
لا أتكلم العربية lā atakallam el-`arabiyya / mā bihki `arabi ما باحكي عربي (Levantine) / ma batkallemsh `arabi مابتكلمش عربي (Egyptian)
متصف الليلة‎, نص الليل (muntasf el-laila, noss el-lēl)

en: How much is a ticket to _____?
ar: adash tazkara ila ____? Bekam tazkara ila......?
el-qitār/bās hādha biyruh ilā wain? ila ayn yadhhab hādha el-qitār/otobīs?

en: When does the train/bus for _____ leave?
When will this train/bus arrive in _____?

ar: How do I get to _____ ? (kayf bawsal la __)
...the American/Canadian/Australian/British consulate? (sefara Al Amrikia, Canadeia, ostralia, beritania)

en: Where are there a lot of...
ar: Where are there a lot of... (Wein fi kteer...)

en: Can you show me on the map?
ar: Can you show me on the map? (momken tfarjeeni ala al khareeta?)
Take me to _____, please. (khudni li-....., law samaht)

en: How much does it cost to get to _____?
ar: How much does it cost to
Take me there, please. (khudni `ala __, law samaht)

en: Do you have any rooms available?
ar: Do you have any rooms available? (endkom ghoraf(alternatively- owad) edafeyeh?)

en: How much is a room for one person/two people?
ar: How much is a room for one person/two people? (adeish il ghorfeh li shakhs/shakhsein?)
Does the room come with... (il ghorfeh btīji ma...)

en: May I see the room first?
ar: May I see the room first? (Baqdar ashoof il ghorfeh abel?)
Do you have anything quieter? (Fi eshi ahda?.)
I will stay for _____ night(s). (Rah aba'a kaman ___ yom)
Do you have a safe? (fi khazneh?)
What time is breakfast/supper? (ay sei-a il ftoor/asha?)
Please clean my room. (momken tanadef il ghorfeh)
I want to check out. (beddi ashoofha)
هل تقبل الدولار الأمريكي/الأسترالي/الكندية؟  (hal taqbal el-dolār el-am(e)rīki/ost(o)rāli/kanadi?)
هل تقبل الجنيه الاسترليني؟ (hal taqbal el-jinē el-esterlīni?)
هل تقبل الكريديت كارد؟ (hal taqbal el-k(e)redit kārd?)

en: Can you change money for me?
ar: Can you change money for me? (Momken tsarefli masari?)

en: Where can I get money changed?
ar: Where can I get money changed? (Wein badar asaref masari?)

en: Can you change a traveler's check for me?
ar: Can you change a traveler's check for me? (...)

en: Where can I get a traveler's check changed?
ar: Where can I get a traveler's check changed? (...)

en: Where is an automatic teller machine (ATM)?
ar: وين فيه ايه تي ام؟ (wein fī ē tī em?) (Levantine); فين ألاقي ايه تي ام؟ (fēn ala'i ē tī em?) (Egyptian)

en: A table for one person/two people, please.
ar: A table for one person/two people, please. (tawla la wahed/tenein)

en: Can I look at the menu, please?
ar: Can I look at the menu, please? (Momken ashoof il menu?)

en: Can I look in the kitchen?
ar: Can I look in the kitchen? (Mumken ashuf il matbakh?)
I don't eat pork. (Ma bakol lahem khanzeer)
I don't eat beef. (Ma bakol lahmeh)
I only eat Halal food. (Bas bakol akel hallal)

en: Can you make it "lite", please? (less oil/butter/lard)
ar: Can you make it "lite", please? (khaleeha khafeefeh)

en: May I have a glass of _____?
ar: May I have a glass of _____? (momken kās(et)___)

en: May I have a cup of _____?
ar: May I have a cup of _____? (momken finjan ___)

en: May I have a bottle of _____?
ar: May I have a bottle of _____? (...)

en: Excuse me, waiter? (getting attention of server)
A glass of red/white wine, please.
ar: A glass of red/white wine, please. (kaset nbeed)

en: Do you have any bar snacks?
ar: Do you have any bar snacks? (...)

en: Do you have this in my size?
ar: Do you have this in my size? (fi maqas?)
Can I have a bag? (urīo kīs)

en: I want to rent a car.

ar: هل أستطيع الحصول على تأمين؟ (hal astatī` al-husūl `ala ta'mīn?)
ما عملت اشي غلط (ma `emelet eshi ghalat) (Jordanian); ما عملتش حاجة غلط (ma`amaltesh hāga ghalat) (Egyptian)
I am an American/Australian/British/Canadian citizen. (Ana Americi/Anglizi/Kanadi)

en: I want to talk to the American/Australian/British/Canadian embassy/consulate.
ar: I need to talk to the American/Australian/British/Canadian embassy/consulate. (AhTAJ an atkalim ma'a al-Safeera al-Amrikiya/Australiya/Britaniya/Kanadiya.)

en: I need to talk to a lawyer.
ar: محتاج أحكي مع محامي (mehtāj ahki ma`a mohāmi )

en: Can I just pay a fine now?
ar: أقدر أدفع غرامة الآن؟ (aqdar adfa` gharāma al'ān?)
